ValidationRule.description: Error if Shipping or Billing fields are empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT((LEN(BillingState) = 2 && (BillingCountry = 'US' || BillingCountry = 'USA' || BillingCountry = 'United States' || BillingCountry = '' )) && (LEN(ShippingState) = 2 && (ShippingCountry = 'US' || ShippingCountry = 'USA' || ShippingCountry = 'United States' || ShippingCountry = '' )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Shipping or Billing addresses are not valid to create account
